desc: African Logic offers a range of clothing and safari gear for the discerning traveler exploring Africa. Enjoy browsing our fabulous range - you'll be so glad you did...

layout.text: Real Safari Gear for Real People.

Elegant. Sophisticated. Affordable.
This is your time! Go... Do... Be...
Fill your memory jar with beautiful recollections!
"Because unbranded IS the new brand!"
(ALL PRICES INCL.)
